You have updated your MACI key, and are: 您已更新 MACI 密钥并注册投票。
The MACI Key you have provided is either: 您提供的 MACI 密钥不正确或未注册
You have submitted your ballot! Feel fre: 您已提交选票！如果您改变主意，请随时重新提交。
Unregistered MACI Keypair: Enter a valid: 未注册的 MACI 密钥对：输入有效的 MACI 密码以继续
You can add it back to the ballot later: 您可以稍后将其添加回选票
You can only add up to 8 options to your: 您最多只能在选票中添加 8 个选项
You can now vote on this project: 您现在可以对这个项目进行投票
This is a directory of projects!: 这是项目目录！此页面将在活动开始后更新，让您将项目添加到真实选票中并为您在活动中遇到的项目投票。点击此处了解更多信息。 📖🧐.
When a voter is whitelisted: 选民将收到 MACI 密码 和语音积分
Everyone will begin with 99 voice credit: 每个人都将从 99 个语音积分开始.
These voice credits are used to cast vot: 这些语音积分用于对选票上的项目进行投票.
You can add up to 8 projects: 您最多可以在选票中添加 8 个项目，并在它们之间分配您的发言权。做出明智的选择。
Casting a vote: 为项目投票将花费 您想要的投票数的平方 (n^2) 个语音积分。例如，如果您想为项目 A 投 5 票，则需要 25 (5^2) 个语音积分。
You cannot use more voice credits than y: 您不能使用比您拥有的更多的语音积分。由于每个选民从 99 个语音积分开始，因此 10 票（这将花费 100 个语音积分）超过任何选民可以支付的费用。这意味着，一个投票者最多可以为单个项目投 9 票 - 费用为 81 个语音积分 - 并且还有 18 个语音积分可用于投票给其他项目。
You can submit many ballots: 在投票期间，您可以提交多张选票。
Only the final submitted ballot will be: 只有最终提交的选票将计入最终计票。没有人相信。
The ballot will be tallied at the end of: 投票将在投票期结束时统计，奖池将根据活动期间获得的票数分配给所有项目（通过二次资助）。
On this screen you can add votes to each: 在此屏幕上，您可以为投票中的每个项目添加投票。每次您单击该按钮时，它都会为您的项目添加另一票。随意尝试您想投的票，然后在您对选票满意后提交！
You can play a fundamental role as a par: 作为社区的一员，您可以在支持当地社区和探索通过二次投票为公共产品筹资的新方式方面发挥重要作用
During the venue, our ETHCommunity team: 活动期间，我们的团队将向您发送电子邮件或二维码。这将包括您将用于投票的“MACI”密钥。
Below you will find instructions to help: 您将在下面找到帮助支持本地项目的说明。学到更多
All ETHCommunity attendees will receive: 所有与会者都将收到一封带有 MACI 密钥的电子邮件.
This key will allow them to cast votes i: 该密钥将允许他们投票支持申请获得资金的项目。要投票，您必须在您的自托管钱包中有一个地址，并有一些 $MATIC 用于支付交易费用以及有效的投票密钥.
Voting is pseudo-anonymous, but to recor: 投票是伪匿名的，但要记录投票，您的 MACI 密钥将由团队提供给您。
During the event, you’ll be able to ask: 在活动期间，您将能够询问资助过程。
If you have any questions, please, feel: 如果您有任何问题，请随时在活动中询问我们的志愿者.
The MACI (Minimum Anti-Collision Infrast: MACI（Minimum Anti-Collision Infrastructure）使用零知识证明来防止区块链投票中的审查和串通（在此页面上阅读有关 MACI 的更多信息）
Each voter gets a pseudo-random MACI key: 每个选民都会获得一个伪随机 MACI 密钥，用于加密和验证您的选票。这是该轮投票的唯一方式，并且可以在该轮活动期间随时更改您的投票，因此请妥善保管，不要分享。
'不是你的 MACI，不是你的投票'.
Keep it safe! Anyone who logs in with yo: 注意安全！使用您的 MACI 密钥登录的任何人都可以代表您投票 - 甚至可以使您之前的投票无效。感谢您的投票，社区项目可以获得资金以继续建设。你的投票很重要，让它发挥作用。
Step 1: Get your unique MACI key: Step 1: Get your unique MACI key
ETHCommunity team will send your MACI ke: ETHCommunity team will send your MACI key the email address you used to register for the event.
Step 2: Connect your wallet and enter yo: Step 2: Connect your wallet and enter your MACI key
Click on ‘START’ and it’ll direct you to: Click on ‘START’ and it’ll direct you to the voting website.
Tap 'Connect' and follow the instruction: Tap 'Connect' and follow the instructions to successfully connect your Wallet, (WalletConnect is also available).
Once your wallet is connected, enter you: Once your wallet is connected, enter your MACI key in the field below and press 'Save'.
Congratulations! You have just successfu: Congratulations! You have just successfully registered.
Web3 and social impact initiatives that: Web3 and social impact initiatives that contribute to the ecosystem can register to receive funding. Within the 'Project List' page of the website you can learn about them and visit their websites and social networks to learn more.
If you want to vote for a project, press: If you want to vote for a project, press the purple button with the vote icon on the ballot process, once the vote is confirmed a pop-up will appear notifying the successful registration of the vote. Look at all the projects and choose the ones you want to support (up to 8 in total).
Disclaimer: These projects will not be p: Disclaimer: These projects will not be presented during the event, it will be up to you to read and choose which projects you want to vote for to receive the funds made available by the generous donors.
You can choose up to 8 projects to vote: You can choose up to 8 projects to vote for, or fewer, as you prefer. With your MACI password you can change your vote before voting closes.
Go back to 'Your vote' using the navigat: Go back to 'Your vote' using the navigation menu on the left of the screen (the 4 squares symbol) and you will see the projects you’ve selected. On this screen, you’ll be able to add voice credits to each selected project. Each time you click the button, a credit will be added to your selected project.
You can distribute your voice credits be: 您可以根据需要在项目之间分配语音积分，但语音积分和投票不是 1:1
This is where the 'quadratic' part comes: 这就是“二次”部分发挥作用的地方：对一个项目进行投票将使您花费您想要投的票数的平方
For example, if you want to cast 1 vote: 例如，如果您想为项目 A 投 1 票，则需要 1 个语音积分； 2 票将花费 4 学分； 5 票将花费 25 个学分，以此类推。
Everyone will start with 99 <strong>voic: 每个人都将从 99 个语音积分开始
These credits will be used to cast votes: 这些积分将用于为您选择支持的项目投票。
You can add up to <strong>8 projects</st: 您最多可以在投票中添加 8 个项目，并在其中分配您的发言权。做出明智的选择。
Casting a vote on a project will <strong: 为项目投票将花费您想要投票数的平方的语音积分。例如，如果您想为项目 A 投 5 票，则需要 25 个语音积分。
You <strong>cannot use more voice credit: 您使用的语音积分不能超过您分配的数量。由于每个选民从 99 个语音积分开始，因此 10 票（花费 100 个语音积分）是任何一个选民都买不起的。这意味着，一个投票者最多可以为一个项目投 9 票 - 费用为 81 个语音积分 - 并且还有 18 个语音积分可用于投票给其他项目。
Once you’re satisfied with your votes, r: Once you’re satisfied with your votes, register them by pressing the 'Submit' button on the website.
Then, you’ll receive a transaction confi: Then, you’ll receive a transaction confirmation request in your wallet, accept it.
Remember that as long as voting is open,: Remember that as long as voting is open, anyone who has your MACI password can register a new vote and invalidate the previous one.
You can register multiple votes during t: You can register multiple votes during the voting period. Only your last recorded vote will be considered in the vote count.
The vote count will be given at the end: The vote count will be given at the end of the voting period, and the prizes will be distributed among the projects based on the number of votes received during the event (via quadratic funding).
Apply for the quadratic funding round wi: Apply for the quadratic funding round with your project! If you are building tools for the Ethereum ecosystem or L2, if you are involved in Ethereum community education, if you do research or other activities for the Ethereum ecosystem, don't hesitate to apply!
The project needs to be based, or workin: The project needs to be based, or working with local communities, or in the surroundings of Taiwan.
Public goods focused on Web3 / impact DA: Public goods focused on Web3 / impact DAOs / decentralized projects can also participate.
Projects are required to have a focus on: Projects are required to have a focus on public goods or social impact, so they must have the quality of non-rivalry (the use by one individual does not prevent the use of others) and must be non-exclusive (any can access or use it). Read more about public goods
Public goods can be one of the various i: Public goods can be one of the various impacts of the project but it must explicitly mention how the funds will be used if they’re received. Example: Funding a free Ethereum course for a high school in Mendoza.
Projects are not required to be web3 or: Projects are not required to be web3 or crypto-native, but will need to submit an Ethereum wallet that they control as part of the application process. We encourage the use of self-custody solutions but any valid Ethereum address will be accepted.
What does it mean to enroll as a benefic: What does it mean to enroll as a beneficiary?
Submitting your project makes you eligib: Submitting your project makes you eligible to receive funds provided for the QF initiative at ETHCommunity, but does not guarantee funding. There will be a filter to the initiatives presented carried out by a group of volunteers from QF ETHCommunity to determine that the initiatives are in accordance with the requirements and that they’re initiatives that do not go against the law.
This financing is a donation and has no: This financing is a donation and has no associated reports, returns, or obligations on the part of the project. How much each project receives will be decided by ETHCommunity attendees who vote during the event. If you are unsure about this, feel free to contact the team at sponsors@ETHCommunity.org.
<strong>Please note that the team will N: Please note that the team will NEVER ask you to share your wallet private keys or seed phrase, we will NEVER write to you on social media or other channels, and we will not send you a private key or seed phrase for you to use. These are common scam tactics and we want to prevent these bad actors from stealing your donated funds.
Unfortunately, the projects or teams wil: Unfortunately, the projects or teams will not be able to appear on stage during ETHCommunity, but we do empower them to use the hashtag #ETHCommunityQF in your social media posts so that you show and tell attendees about your impact on public goods.
If you post on Twitter, tag @ETHCommunit: If you post on Twitter, tag @ETHCommunity and use the corresponding hashtags to achieve greater reach. You can also post within the
What do you need to do to sign up?: What do you need to do to sign up?
The registration deadline is August 11th: The registration deadline is August 11th at 11:55 pm.
Submit your project using this form:: Submit your project using this form:
The ETHCommunity team will contact you i: The ETHCommunity team will contact you if they need to clarify something or if they need more details.
If you have any questions during the app: If you have any questions during the application process, send an email to sponsors@ETHCommunity.org before the submission deadline.
This donation will be sent in stablecoin: This donation will be sent in stablecoin (DAI) via Polygon to the wallet entered during the registration process. Once the funds are sent the transaction is irreversible, so you must be 100% sure of the address you will enter and who has control of the wallet/private keys. If you are unsure about this, feel free to contact the team at the following email address sponsors@ETHCommunity.org.
